SELECT TOA_SYS_OTHER_DEPTS_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO toa_sys_other_depts(ID,USER_ID,DEPT_ID,DUTY_ID,QUEUE,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5,CREATE_USER_ORG) VALUES(#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dutyId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{queue,jdbcType=NUMERIC},0,#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_sys_other_depts
USER_ID = #{userId},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
DUTY_ID = #{dutyId},
QUEUE = #{queue},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
where ID = #{id}
